title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not set.
OB: When the dataset is not set, an error is shown instead of displaying the group dialog.
EB: The group dialog should be shown regardless of whether the dataset is set or not.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the application. 2. Click on the 'Group' button. 3. Verify that the group dialog is displayed properly, even if the dataset is not set.
